Experience the thrill of ice hockey from the comfort of your home with NHL Sense Arena, the first fully licensed NHL VR simulation game and training tool. Take on the role of your favorite NHL team, train and play in game-like scenarios and drills, and strive for victory in NHL Season mode and the 2024 Stanley Cup Playoffs! Unlock our training subscription to access 100+ drills and training plans approved by USA Hockey, along with additional arenas to explore. 

Own the ice with a Game Pass for $29.99, or elevate your skills with our Training Module subscription starting at $29.

BE AN NHLer

Immerse yourself in the role of your favorite NHL team, wear their uniforms, explore their virtual locker room, and compete against the league to take your team to the top of the standing!

COMPETE IN MULTIPLAYER

Challenge up to 20 friends and other players in thrilling multiplayer matches. Strive for in-game trophies and earn the ultimate bragging rights!

PLAY AS A GOALIE OR PLAYER

Experience gameplay crafted for each position and zone on the ice, ensuring a fun, dynamic, and authentic hockey experience.

LEVEL UP ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

Transform any area into an electric virtual ice rink, simulating on-ice practice and game situations to enhance hockey IQ and cognitive skills.

TRAIN LIKE A PRO

Designed for hockey players of all skill levels, from beginners to pros, this gameplay offers a speed and difficulty that suits every player and fan.

Own the ice at home anytime, anywhere with NHL Sense Arena!
